description: Variation of conditions 4 (replacement community centre) and 5 (approved plans) of full planning permission reference PP/2015/3086 for demolition of the existing Peterhead Court residential building, community centre and maintenance office and the construction of four 3-storey high houses (4 times 4B Rented tenure) and four 4-6 storey high apartment buildings comprising 64 flats (2 times 1B and 8 times 2B market sale tenure; 4 times 1B, 13 times 2B and 19 times 3B rented tenure, 1 times 1B and 17 times 2B intermediate tenure); a new community centre and nursery comprising 388m2 floorspace (D1 Use Class); associated bicycle, refuse + recycling storage facilities; associated hard and soft landscaping; and alterations to Osborne Road to incorporate new footways and revised / new car parking arrangements (Regulation 3 Application by the London Borough of Ealing).  This variation incorporates an alternative scheme for the temporary replacement of the community  centre and alternative construction phasing of the approved development.
